page.title: 14GAMES IN THE DERWENT VALLEY
page.content: Here are some of the games played by local children in their school yard or at home in the evening: British Bulldog, Cannon Kings, Man the ship, Tuggy on high, Space Invaders, Blocky, Hopscotch, Polo, Donkey, rounders, tennis, cricket, football and stilts. Space Invaders When playing Space Invaders you have to avoid the ball which is being thrown above your head while moving along a wall; the ball gets gradually lower until you have to dodge it to avoid getting hit and being out. All you need to play is a high wall and a tennis ball. Any number can play. The rules are that the thrower must not stand too close to the people. The ball must be thrown well above the heads of the group. Anyone hit is out.
